channel.title: Adding sever messenger need held
channel.description: i want to add sever thing where i dont have to go to my client and do ::message and say log out or something....is there like a windows batch file that i can say in it like log out reset or something in stead of opening up my client and doing it.

item.title: Adding sever messenger need held
item.dc:creator: @bifocaler bifocaler
item.description:
@bifocaler wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:1, topic:344403”]This is my ::yell Command But i Added the highlighted bits and Message

if (command.startsWith("message") && command.length() > 7 && playerRights > 2) { sendMessage("[SERVER]:Server Update. Please Log Out"); }

Delta Code

if (command.startsWith("message") && command.length() > 7 && playerRights > 2) { sM("[SERVER]:Server Update. Please Log Out"); }[/quote]yes i got that but is ther a file where i can send a sever message and not have to open client and and login and do ::yell or ::message

Read full topic
